duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily customer purchase orders with proficiency in Microsoft Excel, SAP, and Power BI.
Communicate clear and concise information to sales team and customers regarding the status of purchase orders.
Submit credit memos, return authorizations, and new store setup forms.
Track seasonal product due-in dates and ensure alignment of POs and inbound product timelines.
Analyze customer selling reports and compile selling information into cohesive reports.
Prepare, coordinate, and manage product samples in the showroom and ship samples to sell-in meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
